easyStandard.skull: -X. X is the current agenda number.
easyStandard.cultist: -X. X is the number of [[Guest]] assets at your location (to a maximum of 5).
easyStandard.tablet: -2. (-4 instead if you are at a [[Private]] location).
easyStandard.elderThing: -3. If you fail or if The Bloodless Man is at your location, take 1 horror.

hardExpert.skull: -X. X is 1 plus the current agenda number.
hardExpert.cultist: -X. X is the number of story assets at your location.
hardExpert.tablet: -3 (-5 instead if you are at a [[Private]] location).
hardExpert.elderThing: -4. If you fail or if The Bloodless Man is at your location, take 1 horror.
